author: wsmoak
msg: For testing, include everything under src/test, except the Java source code files.

author: rgardler
msg: initial version of a coat theme (look and feel of http://www.apache.org) - still needs a little work and we should really trim the docs down toessentials (currently it is a slightly modified fresh site)

author: bago
msg: Implementation of a CopyOnWrite proxy over the MimeMessages. Now James always try to wrap a MimeMessage in this proxy counting references and cloning the message on write operations if shared. This should fix JAMES-421 without performance loss.
Also added a few tests of the new classes. The previous LinearProcessorTest now passes!
